citation.abstract: Patients with progressive or recurrent supratentorial high-grade gliomas were entered into a multicentre phase II trial to evaluate the efficacy and toxicity of temozolomide.
citation.title: Multicentre CRC phase II trial of temozolomide in recurrent or progressive high-grade glioma.

blogs.title: The story of temozolomide
blogs.summary:
This entry is part 13 of 13 in our High-impact science series Parminder had temozolomide for her brain tumour – a drug our scientists developed.
